1.content:
Before the current age of magic, an entirely different set of Ancient Magics were dominant. As time passed, the simplified modern magic took root and the old magics faded away. One of these magics was referred to as "Soul." Soul magic saw use in manipulating the souls of its users and its targets, freeing or shackling them from their own bodies. One such spell, "Soul Swap" did just this: extract the souls from two bodies and return them to the opposite bodies. This could work at close range or long distance. As with most Ancient Magic, only one known practitioner of the art still exists today, and he spends his time alone, practicing his craft in solitude.

Though, one of his charms, a single silver coin enchanted with a charge of "Soul Swap" has escaped from him and landed on the bartop of the worst place imaginable: the Fairy Tail guild.

It wasn't idle long, before the coin was picked up by someone. Who picked it up?

They managed to make their way to the crowd to meet their client. He was a tall 20 year old man with a shaved head, wearing a brown trench coat, and shakily handing them the package. While they weren't sure about it, Natsu/Wendy and Carla clearly saw numerous burns on his hands and arms. Whatever was in the package had to be important.

"Listen Fairy Tail wizards. You need to guard this box with your life. Don't trust anyone and don't leave it unattended. There are really bad people who want this, so don't lose it, don't break it, and above all else, don't open it." the man explained as he handed them the box.

While on the train ride to the Magic Council's new location, Natsu/Wendy had been fidgeting in his/her seat the whole way. Natsu/Wendy had volunteered to keep the package safe, and now was starting to regret it. The train ride to the Magic Council's new headquarters would take until dawn, and Carla was fast asleep. Ordinarily, this would be no problem, but it was a problem since Natsu/Wendy's bladder had filled up to capacity since their encounter with the courier. Despite Natsu/Wendy's attempts to wake up Carla, she never came close to waking up.

'          Man, who knew that Carla's a heavier sleeper than me?' Natsu/Wendy thought, half jokingly half desperately. He/She was fidgeting more rapidly in his/her seat, desperately trying to take his/her bladder of his/her mind.

'It's fine. Besides, how long can Carla possibly stay asleep?" Natsu/Wendy thought innocently.

8:00 PM (5 Hours Later)

Carla had been asleep for five hours, and Natsu/Wendy was desperately trying to wake her up. Despite slapping her, splashing water into her face, and even giving Carla a wedgie, she still refused to wake up. The only toilet on the train was only big enough for one person, without anything else. This meant that Natsu/Wendy couldn't take the package with him/her and he/she couldn't leave it with a slumbering Carla. However, he/she couldn't necessarily wet him/herself either!

'I can't take it anymore! I'm going to pee my pants!' Natsu/Wendy cried inwardly.

In that instant, Natsu/Wendy hastily left the package next to a sleeping Carla and rushed off, in speeds that Jet would be envious of,to find the bathroom. Fortunately, the toilet was empty, but it was very far away from where Natsu/Wendy left Carla. In overwhelming desperation, Natsu/Wendy abandoned that thought and rushed into the toilet, making sure to lock the door, unaware of a mysterious figure watching him/her.

Meanwhile

Carla had shortly woken up after Natsu/Wendy's departure to the restroom to find herself alone and the package next to her. Before she could question this, a white man in his late 40's took Natsu/Wendy's seat to talk to her. He had spiky,blue hair with an 'X' shaped scar on his right cheek. His pure amethyst eyes practically gazed into Carla's soul, much to her displeasure. He was strangely garbed in a tuxedo with black dress pants and dress shoes.

"You're a long way from home kitty cat, ain't you?" the man said sinister tone.

"What's it to you stranger? Have you seen a 13-year-old girl with blue hair?" Carla asked impatiently.

"I have, but I'm more interested in that package you have. It belongs to us." the man said in a tone that made Carla almost wet herself in fear.

"I have no idea what you're talking about." Carla said sternly while visibly shaking.

"Let me rephrase it then. I'm taking this package or you're going to that big litter box in the sky."the man said impatiently. He quickly took out a magic gun from his tuxedo and pointed it straight at Carla's head, the butt mere inches away from her skull.

"So are you going to be a good kitty, or do I blow you away?" the man said threateningly.

"You'll face the wrath of Fairy Tail if you harm us."Carla said fearfully.

"You're guild's days are numbered once we use that package to send those wizards on a one-way trip to Hell."the man said stoically.

"Wendy will stop you. She'll take down every single one like you until all of you fall." Carla said confidently.

"Oh, I'm afraid that she'll be getting fit for a halo very soon. In fact, my friend is planting a magic bomb on the restroom door that'll send her pretty face to Hell." the man said menacingly.

The very idea that someone was about to kill Wendy made Carla's blood run cold. She was utterly terrified on what she would do next, but that fear soon took the form of determination.

"You will never get your hands on this parcel you brute!"Carla said determinedly.

As soon as she said that, the man fired and Carla's world had become dark as she heard the terrified screams of the other train riders.

Meanwhile

While a desperate Natsu/Wendy was busy peeing the longest pee of his/her life, he/she was unaware of a man, no older than 19, discretely planting a magic bomb on the restroom door. The man had long,blue hair that reached down to his back, with an 'X' shaped scar on his left cheek. He had amethyst eyes and was dressed in a tuxedo as well, but his was blue with matching pants and dress shoes. As soon as Natsu/Wendy's pit stop ended, he/she tried to open the door to get Carla, but it was still locked!

"Hey, open the door!" Natsu/Wendy cried out n rage. He/She had banged on the door to no avail and yelled for help. At first, he/she thought it was blocked by something, but he/she had heard a small, ticking sound coming from the door. Before he/she could scream, the bomb exploded in the same instance that Carla's assailant had fired his gun.

1 Hour Later

Carla's eyes had fluttered open to reveal that she was still in her seat, very much alive. Her relief soon turned to worry as she noticed that the package was gone and that all of the train passengers had disappeared. She quickly flew away to find Wendy and was shocked to see a badly injured Wendy, sitting on the toilet. She was covered in numerous bruises and cuts, but much to Carla's relief, she opened her eyes.

"Oh thank Mavis you're alright Wendy! I thought those brutes had killed you, but I'm so glad you're alive! Don't ever scare me like that again!" Carla said as she cried uncontrollably into Wendy's chest.

Nastu/Wendy was very relieved to see that Carla was still alive, but there was the obvious issue of who tried to kill them. In a rage, Natsu/Wendy proudly declared "We''re going to make those jerks pay for this!" In that instant, Natsu/Wendy's dress had disintegrated, leaving Natsu/Wendy in his/her green panties. After a brief talk with Gray, Mira nodded her head and accepted the consequences. With that, Makarov began to regale them with the tale of Targaryen.

"Targaryen was an amazing wizard who astounded people with his special Soul Magic he learned from an old wizard in Mt. Hakobe. He would swap out souls of any volunteers and return them at the end of his shows. The people of Fiore loved him, but he wanted more. It wasn't long before at the age of 20, he decided to join Fairy Tail. I had been the master for quite some time and I happily accepted him into our family, completely unaware of what would transpire immediately after." Makarov said.
"So what happened next master?"Mira asked. "My greatest failure." Makarov solemnly said.

"At first, Targaryen had been an excellent addition to our guild, even making S-Class at the age of 27, and earning enough Jewel to be on Gildarts's level. It was then that he became corrupted by the power he received for becoming S-Class; he attempted to kill me and my son Ivan to take over the guild. He used his Soul Magic, not to swap our souls, but to destroy them. Fortunately, Gildarts managed to defeat Targaryen and Prolyusica managed to retrieve them, but out of spite, Targaryen wiped out Ivan's memory of the event. After that, I excommunicated Targaryen from Fairy Tail for his selfish actions, but not before he swore vengeance on me and Fairy Tail. If I had seen Targaryen's darkness, I could have prevented that from ever happening."Makarov said.

"It wasn't your fault master. But why doesn't anyone else know about him?" Mira asked.
"In order to keep the guild's impeccable record intact, I ordered all members of Fairy Tail to destroy every shred of evidence regarding Targaryen and for all members to let Porlyusica remove any memory of Targaryen from their minds. After that, Fairy Tail returned to normal until Ivan's eventual actions forced me to excommunicate him as well." Makarov replied.

"So, why is he back now?" Mira asked.
"I'm not sure. His missing coin does use Soul Magic, but its imperfect which is why you and Gray are inhabiting the same body. It was most likely made during his early years." Makarov said.
"So how do we find him?"Mira asked.
"I'm not sure, but Porlyusica is your best chance at finding him. She's been keeping tabs on him ever since his excommunication. Find her Mira and Gray; she's your only hope." Makarov said.
With that a determined Mira and Gray set off on their mission to find Targaryen and reverse the coin's effect.

What happens now?

132121211.content:
After packing her supplies in a green backpack in her home, Mira and Gray took off for the East Forest to find Porlyusica and hopefully find Targaryen. Along the way, they inadvertently ran into a forest Vulcan. It was a huge, green, gorilla-like beast with white eyes that seemed to be angry by Mira's presence.
"I'll take care of this Gray. SATAN SOUL!"Mira cried out.
It was then they had noticed that Mira's magic seal had not appeared, leaving Mira, the Vulcan, and Gray sweat dropping at the event.
'Gray, why isn't anything happening?'Mira thought. nervously.
"It must be because of the Soul Magic. You can't use Satan Soul while another soul is inhabiting your body. Which means we're screwed" Gray deduced.
Just as Mira was about to cry out in despair, the Vulcan lunged out to attack, only to be exploded instantly before he attacked Mira. Mira and Gray were dumbfounded by what just happened until Mira looked behind her and saw Porlyusica with an open red spell book in her hands.

"Filthy perverts. I should have used a less messy way of dealing with him."Porlyusica said as she returned her spell book to her cloak.

Mira and Gray had shocked expressions on their faces, but they quickly shook it off as Mira began to walk towards Porlyusica. Before she got within five feet of her, Porlyusica took out her broom and pointed it at Mira. Mira was afraid that Porlyusica would attack her, but she was pleasantly surprised when Porlyusica said "You need to find Targaryen don't you?"

5 Minutes Later

After killing the Vulcan, Prolyusica led Mira and Gray to her tree-house and gave Mira some tea, much to her's and Gray's relief. As Mira continued drinking the tea, Porlyusica led them to her pprivate study, which had been similarly enchanted like the closet in Fairy Tail.

"Now listen, the information I have regarding Targaryen is one of the utmost secrecy. Not even the members of the Magic Council are aware of this location. I understand you found Targaryen's old coin, yes?"Porlyusica said.

"Yes. Gray is inside of my body, while his is passed out by the bar area in Fairy Tail holding the coin that did this." Mira said.

At the very mention of this situation, Porlyusica instantly began to go into an uncontrollable rage. It wasn't as bad as Makarov, but without any warning, Porlyusica put Mira over her knee, hiked up her dress; revealing Mira's naked buttocks, and began spanking her without mercy for 10 minutes; to her's and Gray's obvious displeasure. "WHY DID YOU DO THAT!?" Mira yelled while trying not to cry.
"BECAUSE YOU LEFT GRAY AND HIS BODY UNATTENDED!" Porlyusica angrily yelled back.
"Why does it matter?"Mira asked calmly, but still pissed off at the spanking session.

"It matters because Targaryen's charms can affect more than one pair of people at one time. If anyone else touches the coin, they will be swapped with someone as well. Also, for the one who did touch the coin, their body will become a mindless zombie attacking anything that gets in its way, unless it's suppressed by one of my spells. You need to get Gray and the coin back before his body goes off on its own. Without it, you will never be able to get Gray out of your body." Porlyusica explained grimly.

13212121111.content:
As Mira and Gray entered Targaryen's retreat, they were shocked to see that it was in ruins on the inside than it was on the outside. The walls were cracked, there were papers scattered all over the floor, and any pictures were now faded and torn in their frames. Mira had entered cautiously, only to be rewarded with the door slamming instantly as she fully entered, submerging her in darkness. It was then that a candle had been lit and Mira and Gray were horrified by the man who lit it.

He was old and hunchbacked with a cane in one hand and the lit candle in the other. He was completely bald with missing teeth and wearing a strange blue robe. All in all, this man had clearly seen better days.

"It's good to see you, Mirajane Strauss and Gray Fullbuster. I see you found my old coin."Targaryen said in an iron cold voice.

"You know why we're here Targaryen. Just get my friend Gray out of my head." Mira said.

"But of course. I just need my coin. You have it right?" Targaryen asked.

Mira had pulled out the coin from her left dress pocket and handed it to Targaryen.

"You know its funny. I created countless fool-proof Soul Magic charms, but this one was unique. It gave the user a full experience in another person's body, without the vessel even noticing. The only way someone would notice if the person inside the vessel had enough history together. I take it you've known each other for a long time." Targaryen said as he began the incantation.

"By the power of your creator, I command you, RELEASE! Targaryen said in a loud booming voice.

As soon as he finished the incantation, Mira's body began to glow a bright blue and Gray's soul had shot out of her and safely returned to his waiting body at Porlyusica's tree house. As soon as Mira's body returned to normal, she asked Targaryen "Why did you do that so easily? I thought you wanted revenge on Fairy Tail."

"When I was a young fool, yes. However, living the remainder of my life in exile, I realized how pointless it was to hold a grudge against someone who only wanted to help me. In the end I'm grateful, because I finally did my last good deed." Targaryen explained solemnly.

"What do you mean 'last good deed?'" Mira asked him worriedly.

"The drawback of Soul Magic is that it actually uses a wizard's own soul to power it. As a result, the wizard will eventually die an early death. I didn't want to die knowing that my final act was an act of hatred, so I sent my first Soul Coin to Fairy Tail in the hopes that someone would find it. As luck would have it, Gray found it and because of that, I can die in peace. I can't thank you enough. Goodbye." Targaryen said as his body began to shine blue. His body had slowly dissolved bit by bit, until there was nothing left. Targaryen's final sensation was his Soul Coin that had disappeared along with him.

Despite everything he'd done, Mira couldn't help but shed a tear for the fallen wizard. Before she left, Mira found a heavy stone in Targaryen's backyard and slowly engraved in it with an old chisel. It took until sunset, but Mira had finished the inscription and made her way back to Porlyusica's home to get Gray, happily smiling.

In the stone was engraved 'Here lies Targaryen. A great wizard.'

"All I know is that this guy named Rus Bushdan did this to us with a weird coin ,but that's it I swear."Elfman/Ultear replied honestly.
"I've never heard of this Rus Bushdan, but I do know how to reverse the effect. Unfortunately it has to be done on the night of a full moon." Ultear/Elfman said.
"But the next full moon won't be for a month!"Elfman/Ultear shockingly said.
"Exactly, so until one month passes, we're stuck like this. I was able to keep my cover since the trauma of the Soul Magic kept your body unconscious until you arrived. However, we need to stay in contact so we can inform each other on what to do. Under no circumstances should we tell anyone else about this, for now. "Ultear/Elfman said.
"Why can't we tell anyone about this?"Elfman/Ultear asked.
"If the Magic Council finds out that one of their strongest members has switched bodies, it'll put all of Fiore into chaos that someone so strong could fall victim to Soul Magic."Ultear/Elfman explained.
"But what about my sister and my guild? A REAL MAN doesn't abandon their friends and family!"Elfman/Ultear said, almost yelling.
"I'll keep them above suspicion, but you need to head back to Era and fulfill your duties as a member of the Magic Council before the first meeting, which is in 3 hours."Ultear/Elfman said.
After purchasing two communication lacrimas from a nearby magic shop, Elfman/Ultear left one with Ultear/Elfman and hopped on the next train to Era. As Elfman/Ultear left, Ultear/Elfman began to take in the full gravity of her/his situation. For years she/he had been deceiving the Magic Council with her/his act as well as Jellal and now it was in jeopardy. It wasn't bad enough that Lullaby and Deliora ended in miserable failure, now she/he was trapped in the body of a male Take-Over mage, completely inaccessible to finishing her/his plans with the Tower of Heaven for the moment. Whose story do we follow?
135331221.title: Ultear (In Elfman's Body)

1353312211.content:
One Week Later

It had been one week since Elfman/Ultear had taken Ultea/Elfmanr's place on the Magic Council, with successful results. Due to their constant communication, Elfman managed to copy Ultear's mannerisms exactly to the point that no one could tell the difference, not even Siegran. However, Elfman/Ultear still missed his/her beloved sister Mira and vowed to never leave her side again after getting his/her body back. It was during this time that Elfman/Ultear discovered numerous spell books containing magic he/she'd never even heard of. He/She had also discovered numerous creatures from these books that would make excellent Take Overs when he/she got his/her body back.

It was these discoveries that made Elfman/Ultear curious about Ultear/Elfman''s true intentions, but he/she had decided to leave it alone. It wasn't until the last night of the week when his/her curiosity had gotten the better of him/her and extensively studied these strange books. It was there that Elfman/Ultear discovered information about Lullaby, Deliora, and the still living dark wizard Zeref. Elfman/Ultear had been utterly shocked and appalled at what he had just learned..

In that revelation, Elfman/Ultear angrily attacked Ultear/Elfman's study, accidentally knocking down a burning candle in the process. Within a matter of minutes, Ultear/Elfman's study had begun to burn out of control. In his/her rage, he/she unleashed an overwhelming amount of magic from his/her body and the winds had put out the fire, but not before it burned all of Ultear/Elfman's books. Eventually, the power that Elfman/Ultear had unleashed blew a giant hole in the wall of Ultear/Elfman's room, allowing Elfman/Ultear to escape from Era, but not before destroying his/her's communication lacrima with his/her's bare hands.

3 Hours later

Elfman/Ultear had made it to Magnolia with no complications, with only one thing on his/her mind; revenge.

'Ultear, I make the manliest vow I can. I will make you pay for this betrayal. A REAL MAN never breaks his promises!' Elfman/Ultear thought angrily as he/she made his/her way to Fairy Tail.

Now what?
1353312211.title: Elfman's

135331221121.content:
As Elfman/Ultear made his/her way to Fairy Tail, he/she was suddenly pulled into a black portal, away from prying eyes. Upon awakening, Elfman/Ultear looked around and saw complete darkness. Wherever he/she was, it definitely wasn't friendly. It was then that Elfman/Ultear heard loud footsteps coming from somewhere in this dark realm. The sound got louder and louder, but Elfman/Ultear couldn't get a fix on it. Suddenly, a bright, orange flame appeared and Elfman/Ultear came face to face with Rus Bushdan, still in the same cloak.

"I see you've discovered Ultear's secret, Mr, Strauss." Rus said calmly.

"You're damn right I did! Ultear's crazy and she needs to be put down by aREALman!" Elfman/Ultear said angrily.

"I can't allow that. Ultear must succeed, no matter what."Rus said unaffected.

"Why do you even care? This was just an accident caused by your coin." Elfman/Ultear said defiantly.

"It was no accident. I planted my coin there so that someone would switch with Ultear. It was already linked to her soul." Rus explained.

"Why would you do something like that?!" Elfman/Ultear said dumbfounded.

"Because I love Ultear." Rus said almost warmly.

"A REAL man doesn't do this to anyone he loves!" Elfamn/Ultear said angrily.

"Regardless, you cannot interfere with this, and for that, you must die Elfman." Rus said unaffected.

With that, Rus summoned an amethyst magic seal and his hands had become engulfed in a white fire.

"Face the power of my SOUL FIRE! "

In that instant, Rus began to charge at unfathomable speeds and struck Elfman/Ultear in the abdomen, causing him/her to spiral out of control until he//she came to a crashing stop into a building that had suddenly appeared.

"What the?" Elfman/Ultear said painfully.

"We're in the Soul Realm. This is where all the lost souls gather until they can one day ascend to the afterlife. A normal wizard would go insane in a manner of hours, but to Soul Wizards, its like our home away from home. Nothing is impossible for my kind in this realm and all of the lost souls fuel our magic tenfold. You've already lost Elfman." Rus explained smoothly and elegantly.

Elfman/Ultear began to sweat uncontrollably out of fear and felt overwhelming despair at this situation. He/She would never be able to beat Rus and he/she hadn't mastered Ultear's magic anywhere close to her level. Even worse, Elfman/Ultear would never see Mira again. The overwhelming feelings of sadness and forced Elfman/Ultear to sob uncontrollably that he/she was in this situation because he/she charged in blindly.

What happens now?
135331221121.title: Rus Bushdan

It was a bright and sunny day in Magnolia and in Fairy Hills, a certain white-haired wizard was stirring in her bed. Before awakening, she let out a massive yawn and got up.

"Man, why do I feel so weird?" Mira said, before feeling a familiar sensation in her abdomen.

"Great. Maybe I'll feel better when I take a leak." Mira said as she groggily left her bed to her private bathroom.

Mira was dressed in a red robe and she was completely naked underneath. As she passed by her mirror, she came face to face with an unsettling reflection.

"Holy, crap! Why are you in my house Mira!?" Mira cried out.

It was then that 'Mira' examined her face, her hands, and even groping her own butt, before 'she' came to a very shocking conclusion.

Juvia had an excited smile on her face as she started to run into the room, only for her to look back in confusion before she set foot in the bathroom.

"Wait a minute. You never say 'leak' when you have to pee. You always say, 'tinkle'. What's going on?" Juvia seriously asked, although she was visibly holding herself while doing so.

What does Romeo/Mira do?

135332222.content:
Happy held the silver coin in his paws holding it close to his eye for inspection. It was a pure silver, but with an eerie blue engraving of a face on either side.

"What is this thing, anyways?" he questioned aloud as his friends shuffled around the guild mess hall without paying any heed. Happy was the only one who seemed to have noticed, but the coin was engulfed in a blue light, the color of the engravings and dug its influence directly into Happy's soul, freezing him until a second target was selected.

A second orb of the, invisible-to-all-but-Happy, blue light emerged from the coin with tether of solid light and flew off, embedding itself within its second target. Who will switch bodies with Happy?

For a long time, you were a wandering mage roaming the country without a guild to call your own. You had never achieved much in terms of magic, all you had figured out was some pretty basic holder magic. Eventually, an encounter with Fairy Tail's famed Salamander ended with you being dragged back to Fairy Tail by him and his friends. Since then, you've settled into the guild and become a full-fledged member, improving your magic along the way. Despite this, you've always felt a disconnect between you and the rest of the Guild.

You pick up the silver coin and take a closer look. It was a pure silver, but with an eerie blue engraving of a face on either side.

"Where'd this come from?" you questioned aloud as the others shuffled around the guild mess hall without paying any heed. You were the only one who seemed to have noticed, but the coin was engulfed in a blue light, the color of the engravings and dug its influence directly into your soul, freezing you until a second target was selected.

info.brief_description: A magic talisman winds up in the Fairy Tail bar, and switches the bodies of the members.
info.description:
ATTENTION: If anyone out there still has an attachment to this story, feel free to let me know, or save any chapters they might enjoy. It seems kind of dead in the water, and the status quo of Fairy Tail has shifted a lot since this story was created. I'm considering deleting this story to make space in my portfolio. I might do an updated version of this, or maybe not. I'll probably do something rather soon, so if you're still interested in this, let me know before I ruin it for everyone. Posted 1/10/13




One variety of Ancient Magic "Soul" has the ability to tamper with or misplace the souls of its users or victims. A single Soul Mage exists in the world, and one of his artifacts has found its way to the bar of the infamous Fairy Tail guild. Once triggered, the contained Soul magic switches the bodies of two targets and Fairy Tail has yet another problem on their shoulders.


This interactive is based on the Japanese manga series by Hiro Mashima, "Fairy Tail." Let's keep this literate and the chapters roughly 1-2 paragraphs a piece. When dealing with canon characters, for the love of God, keep them in character. Natsu wouldn't suddenly become sly and want to keep the swap a secret. Otherwise, feel free to be creative with additions. You can create new characters, magic types, or locations. Have fun.

UPDATE
Episode 19 of the anime has aired, and features a job request that causes the group to swap bodies. If you're a fan of this Interactive, you might want to track this episode down and give it a watch, even if you normally only read the manga.
